oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Virulence, immunogenicity and reactivation of seven bovine herpesvirus 1.1 strains: clinical and virological aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kaashoek, M. J.
Straver, P. H.
Van Rooij, E. M. A.
Quak, J.
Van Oirschot, J. T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine herpesvirus
highly virulent strain
vaccination-challenge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Specific pathogen-free calves were inoculated intranasally with one of seven strains of bovine herpesvirus 1.1 (BHV1.1) to identify a highly virulent strain for use in vaccination-challenge experiments. Full article presented at the XIX World Buiatrics Congress, Edinburgh, Scotland, July 8-12, 1996.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1997; 75
